title: How To Clean A Polyester Dress
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
⚠️ **Content warning:** This series contains **transphobia**, **antisemitism**, and **abuse**.
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-cw]]

> //*[click]*//
> 
> //Heya, Terry! Happy five years of sisterhood!//
> 
> //I forgot, like, do you drink wine? I got your some moscato to celebrate, but then I remembered you're always the designated driver -- thanks, gyn! -- and I was wondering if you like, drink? If not, more for me! Hehe.//
> 
> //Oh yeah, thanks for covering for me on the, uh... wh-what was that mural? I think it was, like, the one near that... I think the brothel? But yeah, it was// totally //fab. Banksy should hire you already. But like, don't actually. You're like the backbone of the biz, gyn!//
> 
> //So, uh, could you check in with Ella? Sorry, El, that's what she goes by now. But like... gyn's gotten like,// weeeeiiiird//.//
> 
> //Aaaanyways, happy fourth year anniversary, Terry!//
> 
> //*[click]*//
------

    name=htcapd.PNG |

]]

A novella about TERFs, foul living spaces, and doll-things.

* **[[[How To Remove Glitter From A Polyester Dress]]]**
* **[[[How To Remove Kerosene From A Polyester Dress]]]**
* **[[[How To Remove Human Blood From A Polyester Dress]]]**

author: UraniumEmpire
